SurveyEmailBranding.name: SurveyEmailBranding
SurveyEmailBranding.description: Represents the configuration settings for invitation emails sent to survey participants for a particular survey.

Body.description: The body text of the invitation email.

DeveloperName.description: The unique API name of the email branding configuration.

FooterImageId.description: The ID of the content asset that appears in the footer of the invitation email.

FromEmailAddress.description: The email address that appears in the “From” field when the invitation is sent to participants.

HeaderImageId.description: The ID of the content asset that appears in the header of the invitation email.

Language.description: The language of the emails. Available languages include: Chinese (Simplified) Chinese (Traditional) Danish Dutch English Finnish French German Italian Japanese Korean Norwegian Portuguese (Brazilian) Russian Spanish Spanish (Mexican) Swedish Thai

MasterLabel.description: The label for these email configuration settings.

Subject.description: The subject of the invitation email.
